data.text: @j_c_butnotjesus @parog1913 @LackOfToast @JasonHitchen2 @antihobbes there was an abundance of this crap and any normal "protestor" should have turned around day one when hang em high was on the ground and the nooses were out... that mob were being made into puppets by Baker, VFF , Alp and all loons
@j_c_butnotjesus @LackOfToast @JasonHitchen2 @antihobbes So you worked out I’m not “simple”. Thank goodness I was hurt

@parog1913 @LackOfToast @JasonHitchen2 @antihobbes No weakened point. There were a few loonies, as there are at every protest......hell, here's a picture of protesters threatening to cut the heads off Nat MP's at a protest led by Jacinda Ardern........ 
The ONE message they all agreed on in wellington was ending mandates. https://t.co/XgmTchjEpQ

@j_c_butnotjesus @LackOfToast @JasonHitchen2 @antihobbes Personal attack when you might have a weakened point. Not very nice but it is how this discussion around the parliamentary protests went. And there were many different messages some offensive ones. Hanging people, getting rid of 1080, support Qanon. The list is long.
@KiwiLass8 @parog1913 @antihobbes @MariaSherwood2 Ah, yes, the pandemic that “most of the world” are no longer talking about now we have Ukraine to discuss? I wonder why. https://t.co/O7R5lcZ2hR

@everythingj4ck @parog1913 @antihobbes @MariaSherwood2 Also, note the several year long global pandemic of a novel virus. It seems to have captured the attention of most of the world. Did you notice that, per chance?
@j_c_butnotjesus @LackOfToast @JasonHitchen2 @antihobbes We’re they protesting against a virus?
